attributes.action: stop this cruel money making trade now!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dogs are kept in cages 24/7,with no real light,let alone walkies.The bitches are continually pregnant,pups are not wormed or flea`d.disease and death accepted an nothing done as this costs!interbreeding occurs therefor deformaties ie kidney failure,heart disease ,deafness,over shot jaw.this is a sad state of affairs people wont puppies who can they trust?visit r.s.p.c.a.battersea dogs home,woodgreen animal shelter.Help rehome 1 of thousands of dogs dumped every day!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
